New Records: The Detroit Pistons reached.500 for the first time after New Year's Day since 2019
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham had 32 points and nine assists
Tim Hardaway Jr. added 26 points for Detroit and Jalen Duren had 14 points and 12 rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons (18-18), who were 3-33 after 36 games a season ago, have won seven of eight
Others: Cade Cunningham led the Pistons' rally for 118-115 win over Blazers
